entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , York Factory
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:14 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 34.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 38 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 31. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
